sources.title: The Red Fury (1984)
sources.description: A lonely boy befriends a vicious stallion. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-red-fury-1984/

sources.title: The Red Fury
sources.description: The Red Fury is an inspiring story of three people, their unlikely friendship, and the wild stallion that changes their lives forever. Frankie, a lost Indian boy is rejected by the local community. But when a crisis hits the area, the strength of Frankie and Red Fury's unbreakable bond will be a courageous inspiration for all.

metadata.Plot: The Red Fury is an inspiring story of three people, their unlikely friendship, and the wild stallion that changes their lives forever. Frankie, a lost Indian boy is rejected by the local community. But when a crisis hits the area, the strength of Frankie and Red Fury's unbreakable bond will be a courageous inspiration for all.
metadata.Writer: Joe Elliott, Douglas J. Stewart, Royce Lerwick
metadata.Actors: Will Jordan, Katherine Cannon, Cal Bartlett
